You can share this link with anyone having internet. The link will expire after 30 days. Copy the link once created and save it to a location for later use :).

Invalid QR code. Please use PictoBlox QR.

PictoBlox is a Coding and AI education platform with graphical programming and Python interfaces that provides a fulfilling AI and coding learning experience through its project-based approach. Students can create games and animations, make interactive real-world applications-based AI and IoT projects, program robots, and much more. PictoBlox also helps them develop must-have 21st-century skills such as creativity, logical reasoning, and problem-solving. \nPictoBlox has been developed by STEMpedia, a globally renowned EdTech startup committed to providing a one-stop solution for STEM education to enthusiastic students and educators. STEMpedia strives towards transforming young minds into innovators of tomorrow!
STEMpedia, PictoBlox, Dabble, and evive are either registered trademarks or trademarks of Agilo Research Pvt. Ltd. in India and/or other countries.
Following repositories were primarily used to build PictoBlox, which can be found
